points.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
points.status:
The privacy policy has an archive with links to previous versions. It currently reads:
"Old versions of the page

    November 15, 2021
    April 15, 2021
    October 19, 2020"

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.status: TOS: "You may terminate your Account at any time and for any reason by following the process described on our support page located at https://support.supercell.com/ informing Supercell that you wish to terminate your Account. "

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.status: Privacy policy: "Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device or advertising ID)"

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
points.status: TOS: "You shall not use the Service if you have previously been removed by Supercell, or previously been banned from playing any Supercell game."

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
points.status: TOS: "In the event you become aware of or reasonably suspect any breach of security, including without limitation any loss, theft, or unauthorized disclosure of the Login Information, you must immediately notify Supercell and modify your Login Information."

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
points.status: TOS: "Supercell reserves the right to stop offering and/or supporting the Service or a particular game or part of the Service at any time, at which point your right to use the Service or a part thereof will be automatically terminated."

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.status: Privacy policy: "Our Service is global by nature and your data can therefore be transferred to anywhere in the world."

points.title: Private messages can be read
points.status:
TOS:
"At our discretion, our representatives or technology may monitor and/or record your interaction with the Service or communications (including without limitation chat text) when you are using the Service."

points.title: The service has a no refund policy
points.status: TOS: "ALL PURCHASES AND REDEMPTIONS OF VIRTUAL ITEMS MADE THROUGH THE SERVICE ARE FINAL AND NON-REFUNDABLE EXCEPT WHERE REQUIRED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW. "

points.title: You waive your moral rights
points.status:
TOS:
"Except as prohibited by law, you waive any rights of attribution and/or any moral rights you may have in your User Content, regardless of whether your User Content is altered or changed in any manner. "

points.title: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable
points.status: TOS: "You hereby grant to Supercell an irrevocable, perpetual, transferable, fully paid-up, royalty-free, worldwide license (including the right to sublicense and assign to third party) and right to copy, reproduce, fix, adapt, modify, create derivative works from, manufacture, commercialize, publish, distribute, sell, license, sublicense, transfer, lease, transmit, publicly display, publicly perform, or provide access to electronically, broadcast, communicate to the public by telecommunication, display, perform, enter into computer memory, and use and practice, in any way, your User Content as well as all modified and derivative works thereof in connection with our provision of the Service, including marketing and promotions of the Service."

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.status: TOS: "You agree to indemnify, defend and hold Supercell (and our officers, directors, agents, subsidiaries, joint ventures and employees) harmless from any claim, demand, damages or other losses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, asserted by any third-party resulting from or arising out of your use of the Service, or any breach by you of these Terms of Service, however the foregoing does not apply if the infringement of rights is not attributable to your intentional or negligent behavior. "

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.status: TOS: "An arbitration proceeding will be held before a neutral arbitrator. This means you and Supercell agree to give up the right to resolve the dispute in a trial before a judge or jury. "

points.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
points.status: "If you request, we will provide you a copy of your personal data in an electronic format."

points.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
points.status: TOS: "Supercell reserves the right in its sole discretion to review, monitor, prohibit, edit, delete, disable access to or otherwise make unavailable any User Content (including without limitation your User Content) without notice for any reason or for no reason at any time."
